name: Orca Whale Simulator
description:
"Orca Whale Simulator 3D" - Control one most amazing sea predator through the ocean in a huge and deep underwater envrioment and hunt for seals, fishes in order to survive. But beware of the great white shark that will attack you. With Orca Simulator you will get in the role of a dangerous sea hunter.

Orca Simulator 3D/ Killer Whale
*realistic water animation
*ocean simulator - huge ocean terrain with other sea animals like sharks, squids, fishes, orcas, other and seals
*attack seals or other animals
*try to survive
*easy touch controls
*suvival and open world game
publishers: H. K. Solution Gesellschaft mit beschraenkter Haftung
